content: this listing for the warmest feet ever slipper socks crochet pattern in a pdf instant download it is not for a finished product introducing the warmest feet ever slipper socks in three sizes there are patterns for small medium and large the warmest feet ever slipper socks are just that they keep your feet so toasty and warm during the winter weather i hope you enjoy making them as much as i do i made these originally for my son who requested some slipper socks for christmas i have since made pairs for two of my daughters and for myself they are the warmest and most comfortable slippers i have ever had this trendy slipper socks design is a simple pattern for beginners you can make these cozy slippers with beginner crochet stitches many of my testers made them in an hour the warmest feet ever slipper socks use lion brand thick and quick super bulky yarn which is 20% wool and 80% acrylic so they are super squishy and warm you can substitute other 6 weight yarn if you like you will need a j hook please remember i am always just a message away if you need any help with your project - you can create your own slipper socks to keep your feet toasty it is a beginner pattern and is simple and easy to follow
